# SRFaceMetrics

**Class**

An object that represents metrics about the user’s face.

## Declaration

```swift
class SRFaceMetrics
```

## Overview

The [doc://com.apple.sensorkit/documentation/SensorKit/SRSensor/faceMetrics] sensor provides this class as its [doc://com.apple.sensorkit/documentation/SensorKit/SRFetchResult/sample] type.

## Getting session information

- **sessionIdentifier**: An identifier for the camera session.
- **context**: The context of the system during the camera session.
- **SRFaceMetrics.Context**: The context of the system during the camera session.
- **version**: The version of the algorithm that the system uses to generate the face metrics and analytics.

## Getting face analytics

- **faceAnchor**: The anchor for the face that the sensor detects in front of the camera.
- **partialFaceExpressions**: The partial face expressions that the algorithm detects.
- **wholeFaceExpressions**: The whole face expressions that the algorithm detects.
- **SRFaceMetricsExpression**: An object that represents a facial expression.

## Analyzing faces

- **SR_ARKIT_SUPPORTED**: A flag that indicates whether the ARKit framework is available in the SDK for the SensorKit framework.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
